title: So Ive had my phone for maybe 5 days on day 1 recorder worked now can't record sound what do I do ?
content: I've tried turning it off and own I've checked to see if I've unabled audio for the app I haven't I have no idea why it isn't recording sound now  it worked great day 1 idk what's changed I've done nothing different the audio works for videos it works for it voice to text everything but the recorder which is essential for me
